item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 03/28/2024 # New Features # New Social Media Channels Supported: Added Meta Facebook Messenger and WhatsApp channels, expanding communication platforms for Agents. New Website Integration Support: You can use SeaChat on Shopify and Squarespace. New Use Cases: Introduced 5 new use cases, making Agent creation more convenient and focused. Login Process Optimization: Simplified registration with Google accounts. Bugfix # Support for LINE stickers, enhancing the response experience for customers.
